The '''''Tolkien Calendar 2026''''' is the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[12 August]] [[2025]]. It features thirteen paintings of the three "[[Great Tales]]" by [[Alan Lee]], including new pieces. Lee also wrote the indroduction.

==From the publisher==

{{blockquote|The official Tolkien calendar, this year containing 13 breathtaking paintings inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien’s three 'Great Tales' of Middle-earth: THE CHILDREN OF HÚRIN, BEREN AND LÚTHIEN and THE FALL OF GONDOLIN. Featuring beautiful artwork by Alan Lee, including a selection of stunning new paintings and drawings appearing here for the first time.}}

==Illustrations==

* March -  "[[:File:Alan Lee - The Halls of Menegroth.jpg|The Halls of Menegroth]]" with [[:File:Alan Lee - Tinúviel dancing.jpg|Tinúviel dancing]] inset
* April -  "[[:File:Alan Lee - The Gates of Angband.png|The Gates of Angband]]"
* May -  "[[:File:Alan Lee - Glaurung Departs Nargothrond.jpg|Glaurung sets forth from Nargothrond]]"
* June -  "[[:File:Alan Lee - Beleg Departs from Menegroth.jpg|Beleg departs from Menegroth]]"
* July - "[[:File:Alan Lee - fluttering before his eyes, she wound a mazy-wingéd dance.jpg|The Song of Tinúviel]]"
